sentences.en: A large food and game fish ( Rachycentron canadum ) of tropical and subtropical seas.
sentences.cn: 军曹鱼一种可供食用与钓捕的热带和亚热带海域的大型鱼 ( 军曹鱼军曹鱼属 )

sentences.en: An area south of the subtropical monsoon climate ocean.
sentences.cn: 辖区属南亚热带海洋性季风气候.

sentences.en: Because Anxi County lies between the south subtropical zone and subtropical zone.
sentences.cn: 安溪县位于福建省东南部,山地面积广、地处南亚热带向中亚热带过渡地带.

sentences.en: In a tropical or a subtropical environment, they will eventually develop into full - grown and fruit - bearing trees.
sentences.cn: 在热带或亚热带环境中, 它们最终会长大,发育成熟,结出果实.

sentences.en: In our modern city of tropical zone and subtropical zone, Arcade form still has its vital significance.
sentences.cn: 在热带、亚热带气候区的现代城市里, 骑楼形态仍然有着重要的意义.

sentences.en: North Atlantic Subtropical Mode Water: A history of ocean - atmosphere interaction 1961–2000.
sentences.cn: 北大西洋亚热带模式水: 1961-2000年海-气相互作用的历史.

sentences.en: On each road, the plant of subtropical zone is everywhere.
sentences.cn: 在每条道路上, 亚热带的植物比比皆是.

sentences.en: Straw mushroom is cultivated widely in tropical and subtropical regions of the edible fungi.
sentences.cn: 草菇是热带和亚热带地区广泛栽培的食用菌.

sentences.en: Temperature and humidity in the subtropical climatic conditions, surface weathering active weathering thickness l 0 meters.
sentences.cn: 在亚热带温湿气候条件下, 地表风化作用活跃,风化厚度达l0米以上.

sentences.en: The air was perfumed with the scent of subtropical vegetation.
sentences.cn: 空气中弥漫着亚热带植物的香气.

sentences.en: The biggest south subtropical botanical garden in China.
sentences.cn: 全国最大的南亚热带植物园.

sentences.en: The subtropical island has a remarkably rich native flora.
sentences.cn: 这个亚热带岛屿有相当丰富的乡土植物种类.

sentences.en: The wetland resources are abundant in the mid - subtropical zone of China.
sentences.cn: 中国中亚热带地区湿地资源丰富.

sentences.en: They are more prevalent in soils of the tropical and subtropical regions.
sentences.cn: 它们在热带和亚热带地区的土壤中较为普遍.
西双版纳属亚热带气候.
